content.html: Republicans passed anti-CRT laws IMMEDIATELY. Republicans passed anti-trans laws IMMEDIATELY. Republicans passed book bans IMMEDIATELY. Republicans act IMMEDIATELY when they say something poses a threat. If they WANTED to fix these shootings, they would. They're CHOOSING not to.
content.value:
Republicans passed anti-CRT laws IMMEDIATELY.
Republicans passed anti-trans laws IMMEDIATELY.
Republicans passed book bans IMMEDIATELY.
Republicans act IMMEDIATELY when they say something poses a threat.

If they WANTED to fix these shootings, they would. They're CHOOSING not to.
